bibl.title: The King's Good Servant? Loyalty, Subversion, and Greek Daniel.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 210-214: Daniel 11 in the LXX: The King of the South; - Ptolemy II; - Berenice; - Isaiah on Ptolemy IV and Seleucus IV; - Ptolemy and the Day of the Lord; - Summary.
bibl.seg: DINES Jennifer, The King's Good Servant? Loyalty, Subversion, and Greek Daniel.
Tessa RAJAK, Sarah PEARCE, James AITKEN and Jennifer DINES (Edd.), Jewish Perspectives on Hellenistic Rulers = Hellenistic Culture and Society. 50 (Berkeley - Los Angeles - London, 2007) pp. 205-224.
See in part. pp. 210-214: Daniel 11 in the LXX: The King of the South; - Ptolemy II; - Berenice; - Isaiah on Ptolemy IV and Seleucus IV; - Ptolemy and the Day of the Lord; - Summary.
